description:
Manages a Azure Database Migration Service.

~> **NOTE:** Destroying a Database Migration Service will leave any outstanding tasks untouched. This is to avoid unexpectedly deleting any tasks managed outside of terraform.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: Specify the name of the database migration service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: Name of the resource group in which to create the database migration service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

SkuName.description: The sku name of the database migration service. Possible values are `Premium_4vCores`, `Standard_1vCores`, `Standard_2vCores` and `Standard_4vCores`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

SubnetId.description: The ID of the virtual subnet resource to which the database migration service should be joined. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assigned to the resource.
